<small>Hebrew form: [[H0518]]</small>
<small>Also see: [[H3861]]</small>

 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הֵן‎</span> **conjunction** ==if, whether== (Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵן‎</span>, q. v.: Zenjirli, Egyptian Aramaic ([[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>Pap. A 7</sup> +), Palmyrene, Nabataean <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הן‎</span>, Mandean <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הין‎</span> ***if*** [<lookup onclick="bdbabb('Tg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span><sup>**Onk Jon**</sup></lookup> use <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אם‎</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵑ7]]<sup>**Jer**</sup> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אין‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">]); — 

**1.** ***if***, [[Dan.2.6|Dan 2:6]]; [[Dan.3.15|Dan 3:15]]; [[Dan.3.17|Dan 3:17]]; [[Dan.4.24|Dan 4:24]]; [[Dan.5.16|Dan 5:16]];   [[Dan.5.17|Dan 5:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵן לָא ֗֗֗ ‎</span> [[Dan.2.5|Dan 2:5]]; [[Dan.2.9|Dan 2:9]]; [[Dan.3.15|Dan 3:15]] v[[Dan.3.18|Dan 3:18]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הֵן לָ֔א‎</span> ***if not.*** 

**2.** repeated, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵן ֗֗֗ הֵן‎</span> ***sive ... sive, whether ... or*** (compare Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִם‎</span>, **1 b 1**), [[Ezra.7.26|Ezra 7:26]] (so Palmyrene<sup>[[BDB#Tariff|Tariff]] ii.c.19</sup>). 

**3.** in indirect question, ***whether*** (compare <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִם‎</span>, **2 b**), [[Ezra.5.17|Ezra 5:17]]b <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְבַּקַּר ֗֗֗ הֵן אִיתַי ֗֗֗ ‎</span>. — See also <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לָהֵן‎</span>. p. 50, 243, 1099 

<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הַסִּק‎</span> etc., see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סלק‎</span> Haph\`el
